resources.string: Before you post, make sure your content does not violate the terms and conditions of UTAR Community. We reserve the right to amend or delete any offending posts.
I have read and agreed to the T&C.
What is the rules and regulations before creating post?

Certain content, including sexual, violent, or graphic material, is prohibited. Respectful behavior is expected, with no tolerance for harassment or bullying. Users must provide warnings for sensitive content. Illegal activities and intellectual property violations are strictly forbidden. Reporting violations is encouraged, and the moderation team will take action. All posts must comply with community guidelines and terms of service.
If users violate the rules, what are the consequences?

If users violate the rules, they may face consequences such as removal of their posts, warnings, or account suspension. Our team will review reported violations and take appropriate action to maintain a safe and respectful environment within the app. Repeat offenders may face stricter penalties, including permanent account suspension. It is important for all users to adhere to the rules to ensure a positive experience for everyone in the community.
How do I reset my password?
To reset your password, go to the login screen and select the \"Forgot Password\" option. Follow the prompts to enter your email address and receive instructions for resetting your password.
What should I do if I encounter a technical issue or bug?

If you encounter a technical issue or bug, please report it via email at [support@example.com]. Provide as much detail as possible about the issue, including steps to reproduce it and any error messages you may have received.
How can I provide feedback or suggest new features?
We welcome your feedback and suggestions! You can submit them through the app\'s feedback form or by emailing us at [feedback@example.com]. We appreciate your input as we strive to improve our app.
How can I change my account settings or preferences?

To change your account settings, navigate to the Profile section within the app. From there, you can update your profile information. From the switch button on the top right of navigation drawer can help you to change light mode into dark mode.
This wont \'t be displayed to public
